statements: DELETE FROM security_incident_audit_log WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM security_incident_audit_log WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM security_incident_audit_log WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM security_incident_audit_log WHERE description LIKE '%Unauthorized%');
DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE id = 1 AND incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE details LIKE '%unauthorized access%';
DELETE FROM incident_locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' AND date_created < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'super_admin';
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE event_type = 'Access Denied' AND date_logged < '2022-03-01';
DELETE FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM permissions WHERE role = 'admin');
